question: Which country houses "Pallas-Yllastunturi National Park"?
explanation: Pallas-Yllastunturi National Park is an IUCN Category II national park located in Finland. This national park is Finland's third-largest national park. This is Finland's most popular national park in which its landscape is dominated by a chain of fells stretching for approximately 100km and the taiga forests in the boreal forest zone. This is one of Finland's national landscapes.
